title: Interpretation of apricots in a dream: Seeing apricots in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of apricots for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married or single young man, whether fresh, sweet, sour, dried apricots were collected from the market and more by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq Apricot Apricots in a dream Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi said: Apricots in a dream mean money, But seeing it in a dream at a different time means illness and exhaustion, and green apricots indicate wealth, and apricots indicate worthless or miserly. Breaking an apricot branch shows strife, quarrels, and hypocrisy, and yellow apricots are illness and delusion, and apricots in a man’s dream show a rich woman wearing her clothes. The Sheikh spoke. Al-Nabulsi about a dream of seeing apricots in a dream, and this explained that an apricot in a dream is a dinar, if it is at the right time and when it is a disease. Seeing dreams in which you see apricots growing indicates that the future holds hidden bitterness and sadness for you, even if it is rosy on the outside. If you eat apricots, this symbolizes the approach of disastrous effects, but if others eat apricots, your surroundings will be averse to your desires. A friend says: “Apricots indicate that you are wasting your time on trifles or small, worthless things.” Linguistic interpretation of apricotsApricots in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin narrated that seeing apricots in a dream means illness, and whoever dreams of eating green apricots, this is a sign of recovery from illness or Charity is given with money, and eating yellow apricots spends money on healing. Eating unripe apricots from trees is a sign of lack of religion and negligence in worship. Also, a man is considered to have a lot of money. As for taking apricots from under a tree, it means marrying an unmarried woman with money, but she has already been married and abandoning worship. Taking an apricot branch as a stick is a sign of wealth and knowledge. And benefit. Seeing sour apricots is a sign of anxiety, problems and sadness, and green apricots are clear if they taste sweet and delicious. Apricots in one dream. An unmarried girl seeing apricots in a dream is a sign of a prosperous future or luck and abundance of money. Seeing ripe and ruddy apricots is a sign of health Good. Psychologically or physically, the good is in seeing a large apricot. On the contrary, rotten and rotten apricots indicate a difficult financial situation and serious psychological distress. Apricots in a married woman’s dream. As for the interpretation of seeing apricots in a married woman’s dream, it is an indication of the husband or symbolizes the family. Apricot fruits are an indication of children. The best dream for a married woman is to see her buying apricots and eating them if they are on time, and apricot juice or eating them in a dream is a sign of happiness and joy. Money, poverty, and suffering. Apricots in a pregnant woman’s dream. Seeing apricots in a pregnant woman’s dream is an indication of the removal of worries, problems, and pain, especially if their taste is delicious and tasty. Apricots in a man’s dream. As for the interpretation of a person who sees apricots in his dream, it is a sign of money, and buying apricots means work and trade. Eating apricots means nutrition and good luck. If the taste of apricots is sweet and delicious,

title: Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Seeing a snake in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried girl sees a snake in a dream, this means that she will take the emirate for herself with evil and perform actions that God is not pleased with, so she must be prepared to maintain her prayers and remember God permanently. But when seeing a single girl walking with a snake, this indicates There is a cheerful man in this girl’s life and he will cause her great harm. But if the girl sees a black snake in a dream, this shows a lot of envy in this girl’s life and affects her life badly. But if the snake that the girl saw in the dream was yellow, This indicates her bad luck in her life, and if it is related to a person, she must prevent him from it; Because this person is notorious and immoral. Seeing a snake in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a snake in her dream, this means that there are people who look at her life and its details with eyes of hatred and envy, so she must spend her needs and affairs in secrecy. But if the snake that a married woman saw is green, and this It indicates that she is married to a righteous, pious man who is close to God Almighty and that he must protect him. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a married woman with a snake in a dream indicates that she will be exposed to many problems in her life in the coming period. But if the married woman sees many small snakes in the dream, this It indicates that there are many problems, but because of children. What is the interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a pregnant woman? A pregnant woman seeing a snake in the nipple has many interpretations because it depends on seeing the dream in which month of pregnancy. If she saw that she saw the snake in a dream and she was in the fourth month of Pregnancy or before that, this means that she will give birth to a naughty child and she must correct this child from a young age and take care of his upbringing. . Raising him in a sound religious manner and correcting his mistakes permanently without going out of his way in anything. What is the interpretation of the color of a snake in a dream? Never. For a married woman, this indicates a good husband, but for an unmarried girl, this indicates her relationship with a person who does not suit her. Regarding seeing a snake. Black, this indicates hatred, jealousy, and envy from the people closest to the fortuneteller, so there will be prevention from those around him. As for the red or brown colored snake, it indicates the man’s love and his constant sense of affection. We have shown you seeing the snake in a dream in different ways depending on the state of the insight. We will meet you later. God willing, there will be other visions, and if you have a vision of a snake with details not mentioned in the topic, please write it in a comment below to have it interpreted.

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing a kiss in a dream from a lover alone

preview.html: What you do not know about the kiss in a dream from the lover in the single Interpretation of a dream of a kiss in a dream from a lover to a single woman It symbolizes many meanings and signs, and the interpretation of the kiss for the current lover differs from the previous lover, and therefore all the indications set by the great jurists, namely Ibn Sirin, will become clear in the following paragraphs. You have a dream that confuses you that you are waiting for .. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams The kiss in a dream from the lover to the single Seeing an unmarried woman being kissed by her lover in a dream is evidence of his great love for her, and if she has a relationship with him without any formal context of the relationship, he kisses her and gives her a beautiful ring in the dream itself is evidence of the completion of the engagement and marriage, God willing. But if she sees someone who looks like her lover in a dream, kisses her and then turns into a strange black man whom she does not really know, he is a devil who wants to disturb her life and spread fear in it. Jurists said that the owner of the vision who dreams of such visions must seek refuge in God from the accursed Satan and spit to his left three times. If she quarrels with her lover in reality and sees him kissing her in a dream, she begins to reconcile and wants to erase this quarrel and restore the good relationship between them, because he misses her. There are some signs that appear in the dream of a kiss from the lover, which indicate the presence of many emotional disturbances in the dreamer's life, which are as follows: If a girl sees that her fiancé or lover wants to kiss her, but a black snake appears that frightens them and makes them separate from each other in fear, this symbolizes the magic or envy of a close woman, because he hates her relationship with her fiancé and unfortunately hurts her. And if she sees that she is kissing her lover in a dream, and a scorpion comes out of his clothes and stings her, this indicates the tensions she is experiencing in her relationship with him because of a relative of his who she does not want to complete. This relationship. And when she sees that she is kissing her lover and sees her deceased father warning her about him and telling her that he is a bad person and not suitable for her, then this dream shows the lies and deception of this young man to her and she may be shocked because of his dirty morals, and if she does not stay away from him, she will be severely harmed by him. The kiss in a dream from the lover in the single by Ibn Sirin If an unmarried woman kisses her lover in a dream, she wants to marry him quickly because of her deep love for him, and this interpretation was provided by Ibn Sirin if her lover asks her to kiss her. If the lover kisses the dreamer in her dream and desires this behavior from him, then the dream indicates the existence of mutual love between them. As for if she sees in her dream a person who loves her in reality, but he does not love her, and kisses her under pressure, then the dream is bad because coercion in the vision is generally a miserable symbol, and evidence even of evil. When the lover kisses the dreamer on the cheek, this is evidence of his kindness to her and his good treatment of her, and the dream is a positive prediction that their married life will be as God commanded us, full of affection and mercy. If her lover kisses her neck, then perhaps The dream indicates a physical desire that he wants to satisfy with her. What is the interpretation of a kiss in a dream from a lover to a single person? The most important interpretations of a kiss in a dream from a lover to a single person. Interpretation of a dream of a kiss on the mouth from

title: Interpretation of seeing garlic in a dream, different interpretations

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing garlic in a dream has different interpretations, as garlic is not one of the fruits that everyone loves in the dream of many people in different situations such as planting garlic, cutting it, and eating it. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing garlic in a dream with different interpretations.Interpretation of seeing garlic and eating cooked garlic in a dream. Many interpreters interpret the dream of eating cooked garlic in a dream as sincere repentance of a sin or disobedience on the part of the dreamer, as a wrong action that angers God. Almighty, whether big or small, but he quickly repents of this act and turns the food raw. Dream interpreters have interpreted garlic that eating it indicates dissatisfaction, obtaining money through illegal means, or dreaming of a sick person or someone suffering from some health problems. Eating raw garlic indicates complete recovery from Almighty God. Interpretation of a dream about buying garlic in a dream. Many dream interpreters have interpreted the dream about buying garlic, and that the benefit of nutrition is broad, and this nutrition often amounts to a lot of money, and the dreamer will obtain it soon. Interpretation of a dream about seeing garlic in a dream For someone A large group of dream interpreters interpreted the dream of planting garlic in someone's dream as good news from Almighty God about an upcoming marriage. Without hassles and problems.Interpretation of a dream about seeing garlic in a dream for a pregnant woman. Many dream interpreters interpreted the vision or dream of planting garlic for a pregnant woman as good and excellent nutrition for her household, in addition to being good news from God Almighty that her date of birth will be. She approaches and enjoys a male and recovers after giving birth in a short time, and her birth will be smooth and easy and she will not suffer from any problem or pain. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or cutting garlic in a dream. Many dream interpreters interpreted the dream of cutting garlic in the presence of a sleeping person or dreamer, as this dream was interpreted as problems. Or misfortunes between the dreamer and his family, and some interpreters interpreted cutting garlic in a dream as death. From a family member or one of his sisters, cutting garlic in a dream may be evidence of problems or hostility between friends, or it may explain that the dreamer will hinder his parents, or he may face major problems in his marriage, which will cause him to live in a state of instability or a quiet life. Interpretation of the dream of seeing peeled garlic in a dream. Many dream interpreters interpreted the dream of peeled garlic as a lot of money and a lot of power without the slightest effort. A girl’s marriage to someone she is married to. Just like garlic in real life has many benefits, seeing it in a dream has promising and positive meanings and connotations that can be reflected in the viewer’s life and the near future, or it can be a reflection of what is happening in his life now.

preview.html: The vision of buying perfume in a dream varies from one opinion to another depending on the social status of the individual, and we will learn about it in detail in this following article. The interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream for a single girl. Many dream interpreters believe that the dream of buying perfume in the dream of an unmarried girl is a praiseworthy and promising vision, and they interpret it as follows Next: Buying perfume for an unmarried girl in a dream is a sign of the approaching date of her marriage, God willing. Seeing a single girl buying a bottle of perfume in a dream is an indication of achieving her goals, aspirations and dreams that she seeks to achieve in the near future, God willing. If a girl sees a bottle of perfume, give her a gift This dream indicates goodness and the large sum that you will obtain in the coming season, God willing. It symbolizes buying perfumes in an unmarried girl’s dream. In her relationship with a young man who has a strong personality and religious commitment, and this bond ends in marriage, God willing. Buying a bottle of perfume for an unmarried girl. Married in a dream indicates the righteousness of her parents and their eagerness to seek the satisfaction of her Lord. An empty perfume bottle in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that she will marry a young man who is not suitable for her. Whereas if a single girl sees that someone gave her a bottle of perfume in a dream, this is evidence of her emotional attachment to a person. Religiously and morally committed. See also: Interpretation of seeing perfume in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Watching buying perfumes in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing buying perfume for a married woman varies, and the indications of the vision are as follows: Buying perfume for a married woman in a dream is evidence of stability and tranquility. And the marital happiness that she lives with Her husband is away from problems and disputes. Buying perfume in a married woman’s dream is good news that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. Seeing buying perfume in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her husband’s love and affection for her. They live a shared life away from marital problems and arguments. Perfume in a woman’s dream A married woman indicates a good and reliable woman. Good morals and good conduct among people and those around them. Interpretation of a dream about buying perfume for a man and its meaning. Scientists and dream interpreters have agreed that seeing a perfume market in a man’s dream is a dream with good connotations, including: If a married man sees that he is buying perfume At a high price, this vision is evidence of good behavior and companionship. If a married man sees a broken perfume bottle in a dream, this vision expresses the destruction of his hopes and aspirations and the breaking of promises. Buying perfume for a man in a dream and spraying after the purchase. This indicates that he was promoted in his job and became A prestigious position, God willing. Purchasing a bottle of perfume in a married man’s dream means that he is married to a woman of good reputation and morals. While a man bought a bottle of perfume and gave it to his wife in a dream. This vision expresses his love and worship for her, the tranquility of life between them, and their distance from temptations and quarrels. If A man smells a bottle of perfume in a dream, and his face smells pleasant. This vision is an indication of his promotion in his work, his obtaining a prominent position, or his obtaining good and abundant money in the coming days, God willing. The meaning of a vision

title: Interpretation of a dream about a bird entering the house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a bird entering a house in a dream We will show in the following lines the interpretation of a dream of a bird entering a house in a dream according to the interpretations of scholars and commentators, not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of a bird entering a house in a dream The interpretation of a dream of a bird entering a house in a dream can be a sign of kindness and care, and God Almighty is All-Knowing If a young man sees a bird entering the house, it may be a sign of goodness and happiness, God willing When a single girl sees a bird entering the house, this may indicate good changes and God knows the unseen If a divorced woman sees a bird entering the house, it may be evidence of happiness and God knows the unseen Interpretation of a dream of a bird in my hand in a dream Interpretation of a dream of a bird in my hand in a dream may indicate that I am lurking and God knows When a young man sees a bird biting his hand, this may indicate someone who wants to harm him, and God knows best And a married woman if she sees a bird, some of it may lead to trouble and God knows the unseen When an unmarried girl sees a bird biting her hand, this can express trouble and God is higher and more knowledgeable Interpretation of a dream of slaughtering a bird in a dream Interpretation of a dream of slaughtering a bird in a dream can be a sign of goodness and care and God The greatest and most knowledgeable If a married woman sees a bird being slaughtered, it may indicate a high status, and God knows best If a married man sees a bird being slaughtered, it may be evidence that he gets what he wants from a person of high status, and God knows best If a pregnant woman sees a bird being slaughtered, this may indicate the birth of a male child, and God knows best Interpretation of a dream about a bird tied with a rope in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a bird tied with a rope in a dream can mean the control of a high-ranking person, and God knows best As it can express the title: Interpretation of seeing drinking water in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing drinking water in a dream via the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing water in a dream has many meanings. And if a man or woman is single, married or pregnant, and today through one of the Vision sites, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing drinking water in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn. Kathir, Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, follow us. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the vision of drinking water in a dream? Seeing drinking water after thirst in a dream indicates the release of distress and the removal of the dreamer’s sadness. Seeing yourself drinking water from a cup in a dream indicates that God will bless the dreamer with a lot of goodness. And livelihood. Dreaming about drinking water from a bottle indicates that the monarch is a good, kind-hearted person and loved by the people. Seeing yourself drinking hot water in a dream shows that there are many problems and crises in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a sick person drinking hot water in a dream indicates that he will soon recover from this disease. And God knows best. Dreaming of drinking water from a well. It indicates good news that the fortuneteller will hear in the coming period. Dreaming of drinking salty sea water. It indicates that the divine is going through a bad psychological crisis. See also: Interpretation of seeing a water pump in a dream. What is Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing drinking water in a dream? Seeing yourself drinking a large amount of water without feeling full in a dream indicates the emergence of major problems between the fortuneteller and his wife leading to separation. The dreamer sees someone giving him a cup of water in a dream, which indicates that God will bless him with a child soon, and God knows best. Seeing the dreamer drinking salty water in a dream indicates That the dreamer will face many worries and sorrows in his life in the coming period. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone spraying me with water in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing someone drinking water in a dream for a single woman? Seeing an unmarried woman drinking water from death in a dream shows that something happy will happen in her life In the next few days. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream drinking water after being thirsty shows that she will soon marry a suitable person and they will have an emotional relationship. Seeing women alone drinking turbid water in a dream indicates that she will marry someone who is not suitable for her. See also: Interpretation of seeing a house drowning in water In a dream, what is the interpretation of seeing a woman drinking water in a dream? Seeing a married woman drinking clean water in a dream indicates that God will protect her from any harm or sadness that may befall her. Seeing a married woman drinking water from her husband’s hand in a dream indicates the great love between her and her husband and their full life. With stability and happiness. Seeing a married woman drinking water from a new cup in a dream indicates that God will soon carry her, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman drinking cloudy water in a dream indicates that she will soon hear unpleasant news that will cause her sadness and unhappiness. See also: Interpretation of seeing dry water In a dream: What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman drinking water in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman drinking clean water in a dream indicates that she will undergo an easy birth and easy access to

title: Interpretation of hugging an unmarried woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: It symbolizes dreams and visions as a mirror that reflects what the mind contains. That's why the dreamer sees it in a dream. Interpreters have provided clarifications about the signs that appear in a dream so that they are understood correctly, and that is why we are talking in today’s article about the interpretation of hugging in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin, through the encyclopedia, each of them through the lines below.Interpretation of hugging in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin in this paragraph We present to you the interpretation of the scholar Ibn Sirin about the dream of hugging in a dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin is considered one of the great Arab interpreters. He explained the meanings of signs in a dream in an easy and direct way. Ibn Sirin explained that the dream of hugging in the dream of an unmarried woman is one of the praiseworthy dreams that heralds goodness. It indicates that the girl has an emotional relationship that culminates in marriage in a short time. Dreaming about hugs in a dream with anxiety shows that the girl is suffering from emotional deprivation in her life, and this is what makes her live a turbulent time. People explain that hugs in an unmarried woman’s dream are a sign of differences In her life, it makes her look for kindness and tenderness in her life. Seeing a hug in a dream means that the girl is an ambitious and dreamy person who wants to achieve goals in this world. Seeing an embrace in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she will marry the love of her life in the coming period. Seeing a hug in a dream indicates The tranquility and tranquility that the dreamer searches for and finds in those around him. Hugging someone in a dream for single people. In this paragraph we deal with the interpretation of the dream of hugging someone in one dream in the following lines. Girls search for the meanings of dreams and dreams to reach the meanings of the vision and its impact on life, and the dream of a hug is a symbol of tenderness and emotion. Which fills the dreamer’s heart. Seeing a person’s chest in a dream means that the dreamer is looking for stability and calm in the world, and the person’s presence in the dream is evidence that he is a source of support and security for the dreamer. Seeing a person’s chest in a person’s dream, who is from his family, is a sign of a strong family connection to him and his attachment. The interpretation of a dream about a strange breast in a dream explains her marriage to a good man who loves and loves her. The dream of hugging a single woman when she is sad indicates that she is exposed to problems in her life that cause her to live a period full of tension, but the dream carries a sign that these days will pass and life will return to normal. Seeing a girl hugging her father in a dream means that he is sick, although he will not last long and will recover within a few days. Interpretation of a dream of hugging and crying for a single woman. Many girls wonder about the meaning of a dream of hugging and crying in one dream, so we present to you the opinions of interpreters in this paragraph Dream interpretation and visionary scholars explain that dreaming of hugging and crying in a dream connects the dreamer with someone who exposes him to failure permanently, and the girl should be careful and take the dream as a warning sign. Seeing hugging and crying means that an unmarried woman will be exposed to difficulties in the world that will disturb her life, but the dream comes with a sign of relief. And an end to the crisis. Seeing someone hugging and crying is a sign of sadness as a result of failure in study and work. Vision

title: A wristwatch in a dream for a divorced woman

preview.html: There are those who believe that seeing a watch with a knowledgeable face in a dream is a blessing, and there are those who believe that it is nothing but an adornment for her, and this is the opinion of some interpreters. Interpretation of seeing a wristwatch in a dream for a single girl: A wristwatch in a dream for an unmarried girl is one of the auspicious dreams and indicates marriage or engagement. With that girl. While if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is wearing a gold watch. It is a sign that she will marry a rich and powerful man. If an unmarried girl sees that she is wearing a silver watch in a dream. It could mean that he loves a specific person and does not reveal the words to anyone. A person. And it is possible that this person will propose to her, God willing. The interpretation of seeing a watch is not suitable for a single girl in a dream. It is one of the dreams that warn of some things that are not in their favor, and God is Most High. The interpretation of seeing a person giving a watch to a single girl in a dream. They will receive many good deeds and blessings by the grace of Almighty God. Some dream interpreters may consider that seeing a wristwatch stopping for one girl in a dream indicates a delay in the age of marriage, and this opinion may be one of the opinions that is not often supported. In the case of Giving someone else's wristwatch in a dream to a lonely girl. She will give a gift from her to someone close to her in reality. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch as a giftInterpretation of seeing a watch in a dream for a married womanA wristwatch in a dream for a married woman is one of those dreams that comes either as a warning or a warning Seeing the loss of a wristwatch in a married woman’s dream is a warning dream. Because it shows that there are some problems that the dreamer is going through, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Whereas if he sees that he is buying a wristwatch in a married woman’s dream, the vision shows good coming to her through her own work. Or her husband’s work. If he sees a married woman removing or breaking a watch in a dream. The dream may indicate the emergence or death of some problems related to her life, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. This may be the opposite of looking at a wall clock, because you are looking at a wall clock. It indicates the collapse of problems And getting rid of all difficulties in the life of the dreamer. The vision of giving a wristwatch to the husband in a married woman’s dream may symbolize. The vision suggests getting rid of all the things that bother her or facing difficulties in her life. Losing a wristwatch or searching for it was found in a married woman’s dream. It could The vision indicates finding many solutions to the problems that he was suffering from and could indicate solving problems in general. Interpretation of seeing a wristwatch in a dream about the man and its meaning. It was said that in a married man’s dream he sees a wristwatch that does not work. It is a sign for him to stop searching for food, Or he does not find what he wants in life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Such as seeing an expensive silver wristwatch in a married man’s dream. It indicates the acquisition of goodness and blessing that prevails in the house and may indicate ample sustenance and realization of what one aspires to. It is said about a married man who bought a watch A hand in a dream. It indicates obtaining a new home or a change that will happen in one’s life, and these changes are specific to the home and its basics. When the man sees
